metadata.name: HackTool - Generic Process Access
metadata.comment: Detects process access requests from hacktool processes based on their default image name

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\akagi.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\akagi64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\atexec_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\certify.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\certipy.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\coercedpotato.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\crackmapexec.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\createminidump.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\dcomexec_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\dpapi_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\finddelegation_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\getadusers_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\getnpusers_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\getpac_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\getst_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\gettgt_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\getuserspns_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\gmer.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\hashcat.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\htran.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\ifmap_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\impersonate.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\inveigh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\localpotato.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\mimikatz_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\mimikatz.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\netview_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\nmapanswermachine_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\opdump_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\passworddump.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\potato.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\powertool.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\powertool64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\psexec_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\purplesharp.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\pypykatz.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\quarkspwdump.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\rdp_check_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\rubeus.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\safetykatz.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sambapipe_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\selectmyparent.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sharpchisel.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sharpersist.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sharpevtmute.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sharpimpersonation.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sharpldapmonitor.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sharpldapwhoami.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sharpup.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sharpview.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\smbclient_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\smbserver_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sniff_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sniffer_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\split_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\spoolsample.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\stracciatella.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\sysmoneop.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\temp\\rot.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\ticketer_windows.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\trufflesnout.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\winpeasany_ofs.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\winpeasany.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\winpeasx64_ofs.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\winpeasx64.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\winpeasx86_ofs.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\winpeasx86.exe')) OR endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\xordump.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\goldenpac')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\just_dce_')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\karmasmb')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\kintercept')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\localpotato')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\ntlmrelayx')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\rpcdump')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\samrdump')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\secretsdump')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\smbexec')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\smbrelayx')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\wmiexec')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\wmipersist')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('hotpotato')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('juicy potato')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('juicypotato')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('petitpotam')) OR contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('rottenpotato'))))

output.summary: Detects process access requests from hacktool processes based on their default image name
